name: NUnitRunner
author: ALME2E
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: libsToRun
inputs.label: Test Library Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can specify multiple tests by separating names with commas (without spaces). For example: tests1.dll,test2.dll...

inputs.name: includeCategories
inputs.label: Include Categories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include category attribute for use in including run of one or more categories (comma separated list).

inputs.name: excludeCategories
inputs.label: Exclude Categories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exclude category attribute for use in excluding run of one or more categories (comma separated list).

inputs.name: testsToRun
inputs.label: Tests To Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify name of test to run. Comma separated test list. If empty run all tests.

inputs.name: separateRun
inputs.label: Separate Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true then each 'Category' or 'Test To Run' will run on separate process.

inputs.name: failOnTestFailure
inputs.label: Fail on test failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true then fail the step on test failure.
